about_the_game:
Featurelist:


  • Stunning narative adventure.
    Survive, invade and rule! In this world you don't only have fanatical war for resources, but also you will conquere states, you're going to be in bloody naval battles and you will explode some skyscrapers. The fate of your own state and of its residents totally depends totally on you.

  • Weapon modifications.
    Customize your gun! Dozens of weapon modification for pistols/rifles/shotguns are available for you. As if this wasn't enough, you can make for your weapons dozens of various modifiers to make your weapon more powerful or paint it in different styles.

  • Everything is destructible.
    Physics of destruction will allow you to break everything into little pieces - doors, walls, ships or anything else. And yes, you can destroy skyscrapers, if you want to;

  • Made with Unreal Engine 5.
    Power Unreal Engine 5 allows to accurately convey the story about the world that keeps getting destroyed by numerous wars for resources.

name: Skyhell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Skyhell is an intense, action FPS game with a deep story about post-apocalyptic world that went into the water except the skyscrapers. Arm yourself with the best weapons and fight the war against the whole world to build your own state from the fragments of the past
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Uzbek, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
